Release Notes:
What's New
  • Functionality update to Include Additional Recipient for RFI Reply Email.
  • Functionality update to Include Add Application Folder Name to Header.
Bug Fixes
  • Update to allow user to cancel a document upload that is in progress.

What's New

  • Functionality update to display two new columns on the Contract Entry grid
  • Functionality update to remove Form Value column the expense and renew tab 
  • Functionality update to remove the applicant duplicated in User Admin
  • Functionality update to include Primary and Alternative identifier for SPDMG
  • Functionality update to migrate the Primary Contact and Alternate Contact for Public Assistance table to Contact entry table
  • Functionality update to updated/inserted the insurance balance of a PW 
  • Functionality update to create a form of the expense module 
  • Functionality update to Include QPR Read Only role.
  • Functionality update to Include Ability to select quarter when updating Response Period for the QPR Admin.
Bug Fixes
  • Updates the RFR Grant Resolution roles to add and edit expenses
  • Update to workflow when user initiates a QPR.
Data Updates
  • Updates the delete option on the Project Cost table to avoid to delete the item when an expense associated is to it 
  • Updates RFR batch and COR3 roles for Contact Entry
  • Updates the view and edit form of the Expense Module 
  • Updates Project Cost table with FIDA GM Cost Code file 
  • Updates the folder 4336-FPA-EXP-000303796 to expense to comply with the rules of not displaying Personal Identifiable Information

What's New
  • Functionality update for API to intake SOW Edit Request Form data from the PPDR Mobile App
  • Functionality update to add a SOW item
  • Functionality update to edit and remove a SOW item
  • Functionality update to select images when adding a SOW item
  • Functionality update to intake SOW Edit Request Form data from the API
  • Functionality update to display SOW Dashboard to list SOW Detail and SOW App Request Profiles
  • Functionality update to generate Current SOW and Historical SOW PDFs

  • Ability for Field Oversight Officer (FOO), to submit a SOW change request to DRS  so that the SOW can reflect the correct amount.

Bugs Fixes

  • Standardized formatting of COR3 logo size in all BO reports. 
  • Edited dollar amount in the 406/428 Dashboard to be calculated using 'Best Available Cost' instead of 'Approximate Cost'. 
  • Fixed performance issue on the drilldown for 406 Category Z Dashboard. 
  • Fixed filter functionality of Assigned Team on the Team Lead Progress Report
  • Updated Branch 4 Targets in the Thermometer Report.
